Hot Spot/Chordate/Blades/Groove:

The ex-bridge officer remained in a sleep like mode from an overload of 
liquid energon that would give him drunk like qualities later on.

----

Hot Spot helped a stiff Groove out of a CR chamber.  "You alright?"

"Yeah, but next time we fight to the Pit with fighting fair.  Am I the last 
one out?"

"Yeah, I hear you.  There will be some major payback against those damn 
Decepticons.  No, you're the third one out counting myself and Blades, looks 
lik Streetwise will be the next one to be fully repaired.  We'll wait here 
until all of us are out and then ask for orders and quarters."

"Sounds fine to me." Blades said, leaning up against the wall bored.
